description:
It`s time for an all-out battle simulation between the frogs and the humans, to see what would happen if the Keroro Platoon tried seriously to invade the Earth!  Sadly for Keroro, his bonus is in danger if he doesn`t succeed...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keronjin tai Pekoponjin Tsuini Zenmentaiketsu ka!? de Arimasu / Koyuki Dokkidokki Hatsu Omusubi de Arimasu
L`affrontement général entre titariens et terriens / La toute première boulette de riz d`Enéa
ケロン人VSペコポン人 ついに全面対決か!? であります / 小雪 ドッキドッキ初おむすび であります
